I

IPostOfficeService - Interface in net.big_oh.postoffice
As an uber-thin wrapper around the Apache Commons Email framework, instances of IPostOfficeService represent the concept of a "neighborhood" post office from which an application can send email messages without worrying about quotidian delivery details.
isAuthenticateWithTls() - Method in interface net.big_oh.postoffice.IPostOfficeService
 
isDebug() - Method in interface net.big_oh.postoffice.IPostOfficeService
 
isTransportWithSsl() - Method in interface net.big_oh.postoffice.IPostOfficeService
 

M

MANDATORY_PROPERTY_KEYS - Static variable in class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
The property keys included in this collection define the minimum set of keys that must be passed to the getInstance() and getInstance(Properties) methods.

N

net.big_oh.postoffice - package net.big_oh.postoffice
 

P

PostOfficeServiceFactory - Class in net.big_oh.postoffice
Provides static factory methods for constructing concrete instances of IPostOfficeService using Properties files/objects to define service attributes.
PostOfficeServiceFactory() - Constructor for class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
 
PROPERTIES_FILE_NAME - Static variable in class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
The name of the properties file that, by default, will be used to build new PostOffice instances.
PROPERTY_KEY_AUTHENTICATE_WITH_TLS - Static variable in class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
By associating a value of 'true' with this key, you can request that the secure TLS protocol be used when authenticating to the outgoing SMTP mail server.
PROPERTY_KEY_DEBUG - Static variable in class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
Enable to log debug output generated by the JavaMail API.
PROPERTY_KEY_FROM - Static variable in class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
The "from" address for all email messages sent from the PostOffice instance.
PROPERTY_KEY_HOST - Static variable in class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
The hostname of the SMTP server that will be used to route out-bound email messages.
PROPERTY_KEY_PORT - Static variable in class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
The port on which the outgoing SMTP server is listening for connections.
PROPERTY_KEY_SMTP_PASSWORD - Static variable in class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
The password for SMTP authentication.
PROPERTY_KEY_SMTP_USER_NAME - Static variable in class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
The username for SMTP authentication.
PROPERTY_KEY_TRANSPORT_WITH_SSL - Static variable in class net.big_oh.postoffice.PostOfficeServiceFactory
By associating a value of 'true' with this key, you can request that email messages be transported using the secure SSL protocol.

sendMail(String, String, String) - Method in interface net.big_oh.postoffice.IPostOfficeService

Sends an email message to multiple recipients.
